SHAREHOLDER RIGHTS. ANon-EmployeeDirector shall have no rights as a shareholder with respect to any Shares issuable upon exercise of an Option until such Shares shall have been issued to theNon-EmployeeDirector pursuant to Section 5(e), and, except as provided in Section 7, no adjustment shall be made to an Option or Share issued upon the exercise thereof for dividends, distributions or other rights in respect of any Share for which the record date is prior to the date upon which theNon-EmployeeDirector shall become the holder of record thereof.
